DOC.brief_summary: CP-866,087 is a non-hormonal compound, acting on the central nervous system, which has been shown in animal models to restore sexual function.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy, Safety And Toleration Of CP-866,087 In Pre-Menopausal Women With Female Sexual Arousal Disorder.
DOC.criteria: healthy premenopausal women primary female sexual arousal disorder causing distress on stable use of oral contraceptives any other significant disease causing Female Sexual Dysfunction including psychiatric disease subjects on drugs known to cause Female Sexual Dysfunction subjects who have given birth in the last 12 months or who are planning to become pregnant during the study
